COMMENT_TX: ej,aloms001,P,hicke901,Fighting ej,loftk001,P,hicke901,Charging mound ej,johnr005,P,hicke901,Throwing at Kenny Lofton $Randy Johnson threw at Kenny Lofton; Lofton charged the mound and both benches emptied; Johnson, Lofton and Sandy Alomar Jr. ejected by HP umpire Ed Hickox
ej,hargm001,M,culbf901,Balls and strikes Indians manager Mike Hargrove ejected by HP umpire Fieldin Culbreth sometime in game

ej,assep001,P,mcclt901,Balls and strikes Paul Assenmacher ejected by HP umpire Tim McClelland

ej,hargm001,M,younl901,Arguing why pitcher not ejected ej,vizqo001,P,younl901,Charging mound after close pitch Jim Parque threw inside to Omar Vizquel, who charged the mound; Vizquel ejected by HP umpire Larry Young; Indians manager Mike Hargrove also ejected for arguing that Parque should be ejected
